PayMaya makes payments more exciting and rewarding. Update your app today and start paying with PayMaya to get "BalikBayad"!

More features are coming soon, so stay tuned! #DontPayCashPayMaya

More features are coming soon, so stay tuned! #DontPayCashPayMaya

Hey, there! We've ironed out a few kinks plus made improvements in this release. Update your PayMaya app today and start paying with PayMaya for more "BalikBayad"!
 
P.S. We're also cooking up with something new, so stay tuned! #DontPayCashPayMaya

Thank you for paying with PayMaya!

This release comes with several enhancements to ensure that you have a better app experience. We also squashed some bugs along the way, so update your app today! #DontPayCashPayMaya

When you’re set on buying a specific item from our Shop, getting to that item as fast as possible matters. Our PayMaya Shop now has search! Just type in the name of the item you’d want to purchase and buy.

We’ve also made navigating the app much more convenient with a couple of changes to your dashboard. We included the regular bug fixes and improvements to this update, too!

As always, keep your app regularly updated and stay safe!
-Maya

You can now add your frequently used Bank Transfer details to your Favorites! So, the next time you transfer to the same bank account, you don’t need to enter the details again.

To make your PayMaya experience even better, we’ve done our usual bug fixes, improvements, and clean ups.

You can now add your frequently used Bank Transfer details to your Favorites! So, the next time you transfer to the same bank account, you don’t need to enter the details again.

To make your PayMaya experience even better, we’ve done our usual bug fixes, improvements, and clean ups.

You can now add your frequently used Bank Transfer details to your Favorites! So, the next time you transfer to the same bank account, you don’t need to enter the details again.

To make your PayMaya experience even better, we’ve done our usual bug fixes, improvements, and clean ups.

You can now add your frequently used Bank Transfer details to your Favorites! So, the next time you transfer to the same bank account, you don’t need to enter the details again.

To make your PayMaya experience even better, we’ve done our usual bug fixes, improvements, and clean ups.

Hide your wallet balance
You can now take screenshots of your dashboard without worrying about showing off your wallet balance! Just tap on the eye icon beside your balance to view or hide the amount.

Upload QR from Gallery
Only have a screenshot/photo of a QR code? No fret! You can now upload the QR instead of scanning it with your camera.

As always, each update comes with our regular bug fixes so make sure to keep your app updated so your PayMaya experience is as smooth as possible.

This release is all about keeping you updated!
- Just sent an account upgrade request? Your upgrade request status is now available when you open the menu!
- Not sure if your app is in the latest version? We’ll do the checking for you! Whenever you view your settings, we’ll let you know if your app needs updating or if you’re already on the latest version. Just tap on the “Update Now” button whenever a new update is available.

As always, every app release comes with the usual bug fixes and clean ups to make sure your experience stays hiccup-free.

Have no fear, your Favorites are here… in Pay Bills!

Add the billers that you regularly pay for to your Favorites list so you don’t have to fill out your biller details every time you pay.
We have come a long way and we have so many billers to choose from! Our billers are now categorized for easier searching.

Bonus: Save and share those screenshots with our brand-new receipts design!

Have no fear, your Favorites are here… in Pay Bills!

We have come a long way and we have so many billers to choose from! Our billers are now categorized for easier searching.

Bonus: Save and share those screenshots with our brand-new receipts design!

Get a sneak peek of what’s cookin’: Travel with PayMaya!

Fun fact:
Did you know that birds enjoy munching on bugs and insects as a snack? That’s why in this app release, we’ve munched on some bugs for a better PayMaya experience!

Get a sneak peek of what’s cookin’: Travel with PayMaya!

Fun fact:
Did you know that birds enjoy munching on bugs and insects as a snack? That’s why in this app release, we’ve munched on some bugs for a better PayMaya experience!

We know you love Favorites on Bills Pay and Bank Transfer, so we’ve added it to Send Money! Add your friends and family to Favorites after you send money with PayMaya.
Keep track of your purchases in our Shop with Shop Purchase History.

Each update comes with fixes and clean ups for a smoother PayMaya experience. Stay safe!

On the other hand, say "Bye-bye" to some bugs we have squashed for this update. Stay safe!

Ho-ho-ho! Christmas is almost here and we have a special surprise for you.Update your app today to see our special Christmas theme for a merrier Holiday season!Bugs aren't welcome in our festivities so we've shoo-ed them away in this release.Happy Holidays!

PayMaya po, ninong,
PayMaya po, ninang!

Receiving your aguinaldo is made much easier this season! Allow your friends and family to see your name when they're sending money to you so they're sure they're sending their pamasko to their favorite friend or inaanak -- Hint: It's you!
Just enable it by tapping on "Set Public Name" in your account settings.

PayMaya po, ninong,
PayMaya po, ninang!

Receiving your aguinaldo is made much easier this season! Allow your friends and family to see your name when they're sending money to you so they're sure they're sending their pamasko to their favorite friend or inaanak -- Hint: It's you!
Just enable it by tapping on "Set Public Name" in your account settings.

We hope the Holidays gave you the rest you deserve!
With the turn of the new year, Maya's here to share with you your 2020 Year in Review! Update your app now to view it on your dashboard.
We included fixes and improvements in this release to keep your PayMaya app in tip-top shape!

Gong xi fa cai! We are welcoming the Chinese New Year with a limited-time theme - wishing you prosperity and good fortune in this year of the Ox!

This release comes with the usual set of bug fixes and system improvements to keep your PayMaya app running ox-some (wink). Stay safe!

Get your important devices protected from those unexpected drops and bumps with PayMaya Protect! Sending money to your family and friends is made even more special with Send Money Cards! Just select a theme design of your choice from our wide list of options and send away. This release comes with added security updates and features to make sure your transactions with PayMaya are kept safe. #BetterWallet

Make your PayMaya experience more fun with Missions! The next promo and deal you're looking for is all here. Just open your profile and tap "Missions" for the full list of Missions you can join and what other tasks you need to complete in order to grab that reward!
